<h3>Welcome Hockey fans!!</h3>

For my project, I chose to create an interactive map that lists all the NHL arenas.
Each arena is identified with a marker of the team logo and when clicked on, the name, coordinates, team name, and arena capacity will appear in a pop-up.  You can also zoom in and out to see the exact location of the arena.


Source: Wikipedia. List of National Hockey League arenas<br> (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_National_Hockey_League_arenas)
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(leaflet)
```
